NAME) workTypeName FROM kf_kpi_type_config ktc LEFT JOIN kf_kpi_type_config ktcp ON ktc.pid = ktcp.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND ktc.pid <> 0 AND ktc.is_show = 1 AND ( ktc.config_type = 50 OR ktc.config_type = 51 ) ) workType ON k.work_type = workType.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND k.type = 9 AND k.first_check_time IS NOT NULL AND k.first_check_time >= #{startDate} AND k.first_check_time < #{endDate} AND k.is_special = 0 AND workType.workTypeName IS NOT NULL GROUP BY k.uid, workType.id
